body.para: The term CNC unit mentioned in this manual refers to the Fanuc Controller FS0i-MF+ series.

para.text: Servo Amplifier Module (SVM) and Power Supply Module (PSM)

body.para: The axis AC servomotors are driven by the FANUC Alpha Series Servo Amplifier Module (or SVM). The built-in type spindle motor is driven by a Spindle Amplifier Module (or SPM) with a serial interface to the CPU. A central Power Supply Module (PSM) supplies the power to the SVM and SPM.
